Sustainable Cities and Communities.justification: Model B's perfect score of 10.0 is fully justified. The course's examination of '土地使用管制制度' (land use control systems), '財產權爭議' (property rights disputes), '規範及執行' (regulation and enforcement), and the '政府角色' (government role) directly contributes to understanding strong institutions and justice.
